title: Matilda
short_plot_summary: A young girl named Matilda discovers she has telekinetic powers and uses them to stand up against her mean and cruel parents and her school's tyrannical principal.
explanation: A young girl, representing Matilda, the main character
A cyclone, symbolizing Matilda's telekinetic powers
A female weightlifter, representing Miss Trunchbull, the antagonist and school principal
A female teacher, symbolizing Miss Honey, Matilda's kind and supportive teacher
A honey pot, representing the sweet and caring nature of Miss Honey
